translations: 犹太人教堂的合唱指挥；领唱者（等于 hazzan）

sentences.sentence: And Marcella Hazan said, "I am a very curious person, and I'm glad people are exploring new ways."
sentences.translation: 而Marcella Hazan说：“我是一个好奇的人，我很高兴人们尝试新的方法。”

sentences.sentence: With all the leaders and friends' help, HAZAN develop and grow stronger gradually in Nigeria. So we will sincerely remember you forever!
sentences.translation: 在各位领导和朋友们的鼎立帮助下，哈杉在尼日利亚逐步发展壮大，哈杉将真诚地、永久地记住你们！
